a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Patents filed for renewable energy technologies, World, 2000 to
Data includes energy source technologies only. It does not include technologies such as energy storage or transport. Figures in
recent years are subject to a time lag; submitted patents may not yet be reflected in the data.
Data source: International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA)
